title: The Supply Chain vs. Christmas | Guest Host: Jeff Katz | Guests: Victor Avilia & Jimmy Gagliano | 12/27/21
description:
Radio host Jeff Katz guest host the Glenn Beck Program. Over the weekend things got heated on an airplane over masks, between two people not wearing masks. Former Homeland Security Special Agent Victor Avilia joins the show to speak on his new book, Agent Under Fire. Victor also sparks a conversation about the current situation at the border. And why hasn't Vice President Harris gone to the border more? How much damage has Joe Biden done in a year? Jeff Katz takes your calls and allows the listeners to speak on issues they've had with the supply chain over the holidays. The left still wants to push CRT. Then retired FBI Agent Jimmy Gagliano calls into the show and speaks on the Kim Potter case.
